1. [Home](https://poteettx.org/)
2. [Government](https://poteettx.org/884/Government)

* ### **POTEET CITY COUNCIL PLACES UP FOR ELECTION ARE PLACE 1, PLACE 2, AND  PLACE 3**
* ### ***Filing Deadlines for an Application for a Place on Ballot January 14, 2026 - February 13, 2026***
* ### **EARLY VOTING AT POTEET ISD ADMINISTRATIVE OFFICE: MONDAY, APRIL 20th TO TUESDAY, APRIL 28th**
* ### **ELECTION DAY AT POTEET JR HIGH CAFETERIA: SATURDAY, MAY 2, 2026**
* ### Texas law requires eligible voters to register by the 30th day before Election Day. The voter registration deadline for the MAY 2, 2026 Election is April 2, 2026. To confirm your voter registration status, you can visit the Texas Secretary of State’s Am I Registered?’ portal, which allows you to look up your voter registration record in the statewide voter registration database. Voter registration in Texas is county-based, so we encourage you to contact your county voter registrar for specific questions regarding the status of your voter registration.
* ### Atascosa County Elections Office Phone: 830-769-1472 Fax: 830-769-1215 Address: 914 Main Street Suite 115 Jourdanton, TX 78026 Hours: 8:00 a.m. - 5:00 p.m. Closed 12:00 p.m. - 1:00 p.m.



* [**Notice of Deadline to File and Application for a Place on the Ballot for May 2, 2026 General Election**](https://poteettx.org/DocumentCenter/View/1030)
